0:
Text: The Fault in Our Stars is the sixth novel by author John Green, published in January 2012.
Triplets:<The Fault in Our Stars
1:
--------------------
Text: The Fault in Our Stars:  The title is inspired by Act 1, Scene 2 of Shakespeare's play "Julius Caesar", in which the nobleman Cassius says to Brutus: "The fault, dear Brutus, is not in our stars, / But in ourselves, that we are underlings."
Triplets:<Shakespeare
2:
--------------------
Text: The Fault in Our Stars:  The story is narrated by Hazel Grace Lancaster, a 16-year-old girl with cancer.
Triplets:<The Fault in Our Stars
3:
--------------------

Text: The Fault in Our Stars:  Hazel is forced by her parents to attend a support group where she subsequently meets and falls in love with 17-year-old Augustus Waters, an ex-basketball player and amputee.
Triplets:<The Fault in Our Stars
4:
--------------------
Text: The Fault in Our Stars:  A feature film adaptation of the novel directed by Josh Boone and starring Shailene Woodley, Ansel Elgort and Nat Wolff was released on June 6, 2014.

Triplets:<The Fault in Our Stars
5:
--------------------
Text: The Fault in Our Stars:  Both the book and its film adaptation were met with strong critical and commercial success.
Triplets:<The Fault in Our Stars
